name: Quantic Dream Game Save File
summary: A QDSAV file is a game save file used by video games developed by Quantic Dream, such as Detroit: Become Human , Heavy Rain , and Beyond: Two Souls . It stores a player's saved progress, including decisions made during gameplay, character status, unlocked scenes, and other game state data. QDSAV files enable the player to resume the game from where they left off without needing to start over.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
